                                              throws org.json.JSONException

        Throws:

      • convertJsonIntToBoolean

        public static boolean convertJsonIntToBoolean(int status)
        Converts Keolis int status to a Boolean.
        Parameters:
        status - the status to convert
        Returns:
        false if the given integer is equals to 0, else true
